title: Clinical Practical Competency Enhancement: Strengthening Mathematical Thinking Through Classical Chinese Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can interpret core concepts in classical Chinese mathematical documents (Sanhakseo) with 80% accuracy
Learners maintain over 70% learning motivation in flipped learning environments using game-based pre/post-study materials and animated story resources
Learners structure the process of solving classical mathematical problems through peer assessment and self-reflection.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
